entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
